text: The FPS Budget and Management Control (, , ) is a Federal Public Service of Belgium. It was created by Royal Order on May 15, 2001, as part of the plans of the Verhofstadt I Government to modernise the federal administration. It is a so-called horizontal Federal Public Service because it isn't responsible for a specific policy field, but provides services to the other Federal Public Services. Budget and Management Control Category:Ministries established in 2001 Category:2001 establishments in Belgium
title: Federal Public Service Budget and Management Control
